0001-01-01.content:
def formula(person, period):
    """Calculate the eligibility for immediate exit."""
    # Retrieve the values of the input variables
    australian_citizen_or_permanent_resident = person("australian_citizen_or_permanent_resident", period)
    has_disability = person("has_disability", period)
    giving_care_to_disabled = person("giving_care_to_disabled", period)
    meets_pension_age = person("meets_pension_age", period)
    dependant_children = person("dependant_children", period)
    looking_for_work_unable_to_work = person("looking_for_work_unable_to_work", period)
    currently_studying = person("currently_studying", period)

    # Check if any condition is met for eligibility
    eligible_conditions = (
        has_disability | giving_care_to_disabled | meets_pension_age | dependant_children | looking_for_work_unable_to_work | currently_studying
    )

    # Determine eligibility
    return select(
        [
            australian_citizen_or_permanent_resident & eligible_conditions,
            logical_not(australian_citizen_or_permanent_resident),
        ],
        [
            True,
            True,
        ],
    )
0001-01-01.documentation: Calculate the eligibility for immediate exit.
